channel.title: [508] Why does it say this when I run? [508]
channel.description:
It keeps saying this when I run Berky-Scape source..
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Bulby/Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Bulby.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: Bulby/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Help?

item.title: [508] Why does it say this when I run? [508]
item.dc:creator: @riku9182 riku9182
item.description:
@riku9182 wrote:

I get the same problem when I try to run alot of things =\

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Why does it say this when I run? [508]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“dvd10111, post:5, topic:340043”]whats your problem atleast im helping out

[quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=436420.msg3206420#msg3206420 date=1273867117]

and you got it wrong look in java and their shuld be something like jdk1.6.0_16 change the “_16” to your version of java in both client compile and run

Stop posting half-assed invalid help???
[/quote][/quote]

Well, helping out would be posting something constructive, not something wrong. That error means that it cant find the class file. If it said “System cannot find the path specified” Than you would have been right.

Read full topic
